name: 1fpid3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylbi(wif(w0, w1, w2), w2, wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), w2)
-| wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)))
-| wi(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), w2)
-| wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)))
-| wi(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)), w2)

body.origin: |- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), w2)
-| wi(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)), w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(wa(w0, w1), wa(wn(w0), w2)), w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wa(wn(w0), w2), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wa(wn(w0), w2), w2)

|- wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)

comment: The value of the conditional operator for propositions is its third argument if the first and second argument imply the third argument. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2021.)
